mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inform (informType, informTitle, informContent, cmid,createuser,createtime) VALUE ( #{informType}, #{informTitle}, #{informContent}, #{id}, #{username}, (select now()) )
INSERT INTO inform (informType, informTitle, informContent,createuser,createtime,cmid) VALUE ( #{informType}, #{informTitle}, #{informContent}, #{username}, (select now()), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT id, (CASE informType WHEN 1 THEN '公告' WHEN 2 THEN '活动' ELSE '其他' END ) as informType, informTitle, informContent,createuser,createtime, CONCAT( (select t.cmname FROM community t WHERE t.id =cmid),'社团') as cmid FROM inform WHERE cmid=#{cmid} AND informType = 2 order by id DESC limit #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT id, (CASE informType WHEN 1 THEN '公告' WHEN 2 THEN '活动' ELSE '其他' END ) as informType, informTitle, informContent,createuser,createtime, '管理员' as cmid FROM inform WHERE informType = 1 order by id DESC limit #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT id, (CASE informType WHEN 1 THEN '公告' WHEN 2 THEN '活动' ELSE '其他' END ) as informType, informTitle, informContent,createuser,createtime, (CASE cmid WHEN 0 THEN '管理员' ELSE CONCAT((select t.cmname FROM community t WHERE t.id =cmid),'社团') END ) as cmid FROM inform order by id DESC limit #{offset},#{limit}
